See man look at this shit. I don’t go on complaining about ntr in the comments like this, but netorase brings morality back into me 😆 got to much free time writing paragraphs like these 😓

@prf.NTR you know from your username, I’m guessing you’re an avid fan of ntr 💀 let me tell you one thing. I don’t hate nor love netorare in general. It’s neutral for me. And though some will consider me a hypocrite, I love netori. Best shit ever. But you see, netorase, fucking netorase is the worst, but before I get into that I’m gonna address the meaning of cuck when I referred to those who like netorase. I’m using the term cuck in a connotative way, not denotative way. When someone enjoys doujins that have a cuckold mc enjoying their gf/wife getting cucked, you’d think that that someone has a cuckold fetish. Also, yes this mc is a cuckold. The definition of a cuckold from a dictionary is a man that has an unfaithful lover, therefore making this man a cuckold. It doesn’t matter whether or not they’re together at the end. And that’s the one thing I can’t stand from netorase. Whether it be fiction or not, when a man is turned on to his lover being fucked by another guy is trifiling.
@tobajas ironically, there is another Reverse NTR from the same author, from the same raw as the mother daughter. https://nhentai.net/g/322433/107/ You may have missed this one lmao.

I might have some free time next weekend or the week after that so I can have a look then but yeah what I do is MTL and spend a few hours trying to make it work. On this one I really focused more on sticking as close to the raws as possible which was perhaps a bit of a mistake since the grammer and lines became all messed up. I hopefully did much better on my last one, though I noticed some mistakes there as well after uploading taking a rest and rereading it. So might look into it but I am not taking commissions not even sure if I will do anymore of this... on a side note after I posted my second translation the day after a real scanlation group redid it and they did a much better work then me https://nhentai.net/g/353993/ not sure if they just noticed it cause I did it, no one had touched it for almost 3 years, or if someone paid em to do a better job but still happy to see it being done. Sadly like me they missed the much less censored raws... https://nhentai.net/g/322433/57/

@haremilf nah I just had a lot of free time this weekend so decided to give translating a try it's all a one man show so I did everything sadly I can't read moon runes so it's all MTL. I mostly just picked one's I thought deserved a translation and were mostly left untouched. Sadly I have almost no experience doing anything like this so both the translation and everything else, like font, typesetting, redrawing etc is pretty shit. Outside of this one I did https://nhentai.net/g/353905/ and https://nhentai.net/g/354083/ did them in that order and I at least think it shows that I improved while working on them...This was however something I just did this weekend cause of a spur of the moment and having a lot of alone time cause of easter and my family being away while I am stuck alone with corona restriction in the town I am studying at.

And just like he said "Thanks for taking care of my girlfriend" which  basically means that he is definitely fine with that kind of stuff ,and he even warned that guy to keep it in moderation ,it means that he's expecting that kind of thing to happen again and he is NOT a cuck because his girlfriend was never been stolen.

Vanilla stans and NTR stans are always fighting about who the cuckold is for liking/disliking ntr, but I don’t care about that. So first attempt at making a translation by me, it's all mtl translation with me trying to crossreference with the KR/CH/JP translation of this one while trying to stay true to the JP one. Since the MTL showed vastly different results depending on the pages. My understanding of this one is that the gf finds out the bf's NTR fetish and tries to cater to it. But to some degree doesn't like it as showcased at her crying when she get's told to dump her bf or hinting at he might leave her. At the same time it keeps escalating with her trying to make him notice it more and more until she eventually slaps it into his face. The ending to me also is different from most NTR endings in that it would seem the MC realizes the NTR fetish is bad but still loves his gf for trying to cater to his fetish. Still I eventually just tried to get this out and didn't focus much on quality...
